General.Name: Taiwan Pelican Express Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Pelican Express Co., Ltd. provides trucking and door-to-door home delivery services in Taiwan. It offers C2C, B2C, and C2B home-delivery services. The company also provides warehousing and logistics, and tally and packaging services. It operates a fleet of 1,100 home delivery vehicles. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 2, Chongqing South Road, Taipei, Taiwan
